com.tome25.utils.config

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.config.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    A configuration file handler.
    Author:
    ToMe25

    • Constructor Detail

      • Config

        public Config()
        Creates a new Config.

      • Config

        public Config(boolean read)
        Creates a new Config.
        Parameters:
        read - whether the config file should be automatically read on addition of options.

      • Config

        public Config(File configDir)
        Creates a new Config.
        Parameters:
        configDir - the directory to put config files in.

      • Config

        public Config(File configDir,
              boolean read)
        Creates a new Config.
        Parameters:
        configDir - the directory to put config files in.
        read - whether the config file should be automatically read on addition of options.

      • Config

        public Config(boolean read,
              File configDir,
              boolean watch)
        Creates a new Config.
        Parameters:
        read - whether the config file should be automatically read on addition of options.
        configDir - the directory to put config files in.
        watch - whether to watch the config directory, and update config options on change.

      • Config

        public Config(boolean read,
              File configDir,
              boolean watch,
              Consumer<File> callback)
        Creates a new Config.
        Parameters:
        read - whether the config file should be automatically read on addition of options.
        configDir - the directory to put config files in.
        watch - whether to watch the config directory, and update config options on change.
        callback - a consumer to call with the changed file when a file changes. can be null.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfig

        public <T> T getConfig(String name)
        Gets the config value for the given Name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the config option to get.
        Returns:
        the config value for the given Name.

      • addConfig

        public <T> void addConfig(String config,
                          String name,
                          T defaultValue,
                          String comment)
        Adds a config option to be read from the given config file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the option type.
        Parameters:
        config - the config file to read this config option from.
        name - the key for this config option.
        defaultValue - this config options default value.
        comment - a comment to add to this config option.

      • addConfig

        public <T> void addConfig(String config,
                          String name,
                          T defaultValue,
                          String... comments)
        Adds a config option to be read from the given config file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the option type.
        Parameters:
        config - the config file to read this config option from.
        name - the key for this config option.
        defaultValue - this config options default value.
        comments - a list of comments to add to this config option. Every string will get its own line.

      • addConfig

        public <T> void addConfig(File config,
                          String name,
                          T defaultValue,
                          String... comments)
        Adds a config option to be read from the given config file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the option type.
        Parameters:
        config - the config file to read this config option from.
        name - the key for this config option.
        defaultValue - this config options default value.
        comments - a list of comments to add to this Config option. Every string will get its own line.

        Parameters:

      • createConfig

        private void createConfig(File config)
        Writes all ConfigValues in the given file to that file.
        Parameters:
        config - the file to write.

      • sortConfig

        private void sortConfig()
        Sorts the ConfigValues by the file they are stored in.

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes all used config files, and the config directory, if it is empty.
